dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C2995003L] Abuse by s34.sports-guru.com
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: The URL in question is currently not accessible as of 3:53:07 p.m. (GMT-6) on February 9, 2007. Legal Response Team -----Original Message----- From: abuse@ev1servers.net [mailto:abuse@ev1servers.net] Sent: Thursday, February 08, 2007 9:04 PM To: DMCA Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C2995003L] Abuse by s34.sports-guru.com ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Abuse by s34.sports-guru.com Added by system at Thursday, Feb 8 2007 11:51 am X-MailFrom: topherssgtp@gmail.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Thu Feb 8 11:51:45 2007 Received: (qmail 16712 invoked by alias); 8 Feb 2007 17:51:45 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 16709 invoked from network); 8 Feb 2007 17:51:45 -0000 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com (70.87.6.111) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 8 Feb 2007 17:51:45 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Thu, 8 Feb 2007 11:51:45 -0600 Return-path: Delivery-date: Thu, 08 Feb 2007 11:51:45 -0600 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from topherssgtp@gmail.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HFDQu-0004uq-U0 for abuse@theplanet.com; Thu, 08 Feb 2007 11:51:44 -0600 Received: from nf-out-0910.google.com ([64.233.182.187]) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from topherssgtp@gmail.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HFDQt-000CdG-Ir for abuse@theplanet.com; Thu, 08 Feb 2007 11:51:43 -0600 Received: by nf-out-0910.google.com with SMTP id c2so835214nfe for ; Thu, 08 Feb 2007 09:51:41 -0800 (PST) DomainKey-Signature: a=rsa-sha1; c=nofws; d=gmail.com; s=beta; h=received:message-id:date:from:sender:to:subject:mime-version:content-t ype:x-google-sender-auth; b=SfYWS7MZ/uahpemSDnqUE8WlxtXIXJK974hL7zHmWX2iBgHLu3bjp3kWywIoeqNirQim7G cIc3wRCsSPT3+pRU66kcBBkg+Z/Zw9dSpzbe3WAanVt9Y93+blgxUC1MS9lDu2Knx/ken1Vb Q4tijTviXRMv89E6Fhe/sdQIKzPWc= Received: by 10.82.163.13 with SMTP id l13mr2900446bue.1170957101031; Thu, 08 Feb 2007 09:51:41 -0800 (PST) Received: by 10.82.117.20 with HTTP; Thu, 8 Feb 2007 09:51:40 -0800 (PST) Message-ID: <64f0f3540702080951w6b6bacf9rd1887cb1f2d5f71e@mail.gmail.com> Date: Thu, 8 Feb 2007 12:51:40 -0500 From: "Chris Whisonant" Sender: topherssgtp@gmail.com To: totkiz@hotmail.com, support@netfirms.com, admins@theplanet.com, abuse@theplanet.com Subject: Abuse by s34.sports-guru.com MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_Part_12397_28903594.1170957100923" X-Google-Sender-Auth: 7f89dbad80412b6b Received-SPF: pass (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: domain of gmail.com designates 64.233.182.187 as permitted sender) client-ip=64.233.182.187; envelope-from=topherssgtp@gmail.com; helo=nf-out-0910.google.com; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 08 Feb 2007 17:51:45.0182 (UTC) FILETIME=[CC4293E0:01C74BA9] (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) The owner of this site has a webpage that was trolled from my website: http://s34.sports-guru.com/My-2006-In-Review/ I posted the following comment on February 2, but have not received a response: I'm going to request nicely that you remove this post. I do not give you the authority to troll my site and use my post to drive traffic for your own. This post have VERY LITTLE to do with sports, as you would have seen had you read it instead of just grabbing the data from my site. Can someone contact the owner of this site and have the post in question removed as it is my content. Thank you, Chris Whisonant MIME element (text/html) The owner of this site has a webpage that was trolled from my website: http://s34.sports-g uru.com/My-2006-In-Review/

I posted the following comment on February 2, but have not received a response:

I'm going to request nicely that you remove this post. I do not give you the authority to troll my site and use my post to drive traffic for your own. This post have VERY LITTLE to do with sports, as you would have seen had you read it instead of just grabbing the data from my site.

Can someone contact the owner of this site and have the post in question removed as it is my content.

Thank you,
Chris Whisonant
MIME element (text/plain)
